|  Job scheduling simulator

A multithreaded job scheduling simulator that appropriately uses synchronization primitives to obtain the most efficient distribution of arriving orders in a restaurant, among cooks and their machines.

|  Adaptive Mesh Refinement

|  Sound Reactive LED Strip Lighting
